annotations:
Good day, 
  
Very Close Head Owners       
  
Pls offer firm 
  
M/V SANCTUM | OPEN OBI ISLAND 25-30 AUGUST 
============================================ 
BC/56,140  DWT ON 12,715 
BLT Nov/2012 
CLASS DNV / PANAMA FLAG 
GRAIN/BALE 71177.2 /68733.2  M3 
HO/HA 5/5 
CRANES 30T X 4  MAX OUTREACH 9.87 MTRS 
GRABS 4-sets, TOBU/ max 12CBM 
      
LOA/B/189.99/32.25M SUMMER DRAFT 12.715 MTRS 
Hatch Cover Double skin hydraulic cylinder fore/aft end folding type 
Weathertight hatch covers: 
No.1 Cargo Hold: 15.75m x 18.92m, 
No.2~5 Cargo Holds: 21.00m x 18.92m 
TPC 56.4 
CO2 FITTED IN HOLDS /GRAIN FITTED / ITF FITTED       
  
AT SEA: LADEN       About 12.50 kn on 25.0 mt IFO + 0.10 mt MGO 
        BALLAST     About 12.50 kn on 24.0 mt IFO + 0.10 mt MGO 
VSL'S SPEED CONSUMPTION BASED ON GOOD WEATHER/CALM SEA MAX BEAUFORT 4 / 
DOUGLAS SEA STATE 3 AND NO ADVERSE CURRENTS/SWELL/WEATHER WITHOUT GUARANTEE 
Port Idle: About 2.5 mt/day incl boilers 
Working (8 hours) & Idle (16 hours): Max about 5.1mt IFO including boilers 
Speed/cons subject to review 
ADA & WOG   
  
  
  
Best regards/Elina Psilla

mobile: 0030 6946101386 
skype : elina.psilla
